name: Amber
description: Always energetic and full of life, Amber's the best - albeit only - Outrider of the Knights of Favonius.

builds.name: Pyro Support
builds.description: This build empowers Amber's Elemental Skill and Burst abilities. The Stringless is the preferred weapon.

builds.name: Aimed Shot
builds.description: The idea behind this build is to fire a powerful, fully charged Aimed Shot with Amber every 10 seconds, taking advantage of the extra arrow from her first constellation, One Arrow to Rule Them All.

skills.name: Sharpshooter
skills.description:
Normal Attack

Performs up to 5 consecutive shots with a bow.

Charged Attack

Perform a more precise Aimed Shot with increased DMG.
While aiming, flames accumulates on the arrowhead. A fully charged flaming arrow will deal Pyro DMG.

Plunging Attack

Fires off a shower of arrows in mid-air before falling and striking the ground, dealing AoE DMG upon impact.

skills.name: Explosive Puppet
skills.description:
Baron Bunny

  • Continuously taunts the enemy, drawing their fire.
  • Baron Bunny's HP scales with Amber's Max HP.
  • When destroyed or when its timer expires, Baron Bunny explodes, dealing AoE Pyro DMG.

Hold

Adjusts the throwing direction of Baron Bunny.
The longer the button is held, the further the throw.

skills.name: Fiery Rain
skills.description: Fires of a shower of arrows, dealing continuous AoE Pyro DMG.

passives.name: Every Arrow Finds Its Target
passives.description: Increases the CRIT Rate of Fiery Rain by 10% and widens its AoE by 30%.

passives.name: Precise Shot
passives.description: Aimed Shot hits on weak spots increase Base ATK by 15% for 10s.

passives.name: Gliding Champion
passives.description:
Decreases all party members' gliding Stamina Consumption by 20%.\n
\nThe greatest effect out of all Talents of the same type prevails.

constellations.name: One Arrow to Rule Them All
constellations.description: Fires 2 arrows per Aimed Shot. The second arrow deals 20% of the first arrow's DMG.

constellations.name: Bunny Triggered
constellations.description:
Baron Bunny, new and improved! Hitting Baron Bunny's foot with a fully-charged Aimed Shot manually detonates it.\n
\nExplosion via manual detonation deals 200% additional DMG.

constellations.name: It Burns!
constellations.description:
Increases the Level of Fiery Rain by 3.
\nMaximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: It's Not Just Any Doll...
constellations.description: Decreases Explosive Puppet's CD by 20%. Adds 1 additional charge.

constellations.name: It's Baron Bunny!
constellations.description:
Increase the Level of Explosive Puppet by 3.
\nMaximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Wildfire
constellations.description: Fiery Rain increases Amber's Movement SPD by 15% and Base ATK by 15% for 10s.

name: Barbara
description: Every denizen of Mondstadt adores Barbara. However, she learned the word "idol" from a magazine.

builds.name: Hydro Healer
builds.description: While she won't increase your team's damage output, Barbara will keep all your units alive and healthy. We empower her healing by stacking HP. When using Thrilling Tales of Dragon Slayers as her weapon, you want to switch to Barbara every 20 seconds and then to your DPS for the ATK boost.

skills.name: Whisper of Water
skills.description:
Normal Attack

Perform up to 4 water splashes attacks that deal Hydro DMG.

Charged Attack

Consumes a certain amount of Stamina to deal AoE Hydro DMG after a short casting time.

Plunging Attack

Gathering the might of Hydro, Barbara plunges towards the ground from mid-air, damaging all enemies in her path. Deals AoE Hydro DMG upon impact with the ground.

skills.name: Let the Show Begin
skills.description:
Summons water droplets resembling musical notes that form a Melody Loop, dealing Hydro DMG to surrounding enemies and afflicting them with the Wet status.

Melody Loop

  • Barbara's Normal Attacks heal all party members and nearby allied characters for a certain amount of HP, which scales with Barbara's Max HP.
  • Her Charged Attack generates 4 times the amount of healing.
  • Regenerates a certain amount of the current character's HP at regular intervals.
  • Applies the Wet status to the character and enemies who come in contact with them.

skills.name: Shining Miracle
skills.description: Heals friendly forces and all parties for a large amount of HP that scales with Barbara's Max HP.

passives.name: Glorious Season
passives.description: The Stamina Consumption of characters within Let the Show Begin's Melody Loop is reduced by 12%.

passives.name: Encore
passives.description:
When a character gains an Elemental Orb/Particle, the duration of Let the Show Begin's Melody Loop is extended by 1s.\n
\nThe maximum extension is 5s.

passives.name: With My Whole Heart
passives.description: When a Perfect Cooking is achieved on a dish with restorative effects, there is a 12% chance to obtain double the product.

constellations.name: Gleeful Songs
constellations.description: Barbara regenerates 1 Energy every 10s.

constellations.name: Vitality Burst
constellations.description:
Decreases the CD of Let the Show Begin by 15%.\n
\nDuring the ability's duration, the current character gains 15% Hydro DMG Bonus.

constellations.name: Star of Tomorrow
constellations.description:
Increases the Level of Shining Miracle by 3.
\nMaximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Attentiveness be My Power
constellations.description: Every enemy hit by Barbara's Charged Attack regenerates 1 Energy for her. A maximum of 5 energy can be regenerated in this manner with any one Charged Attack.

constellations.name: The Purest Companionship
constellations.description:
Increase the Level of Let the Show Begin by 3.
\nMaximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Dedicating Everything to You
constellations.description:
When Barbara is not on the field, and the character in play falls:
  • Automatically revives this character.
Fully regenerates this characters HP by 100%.
This effect can only occur once every 15 mins.

name: Beidou
description: Beidou is the leader of the Crux — an armed fleet based in Liyue Harbor. An armed fleet means exactly what it sounds like: a fleet of ships armed to the teeth.

builds.name: Electro DPS
builds.description: Beidou's damage output spikes when perfectly timing the counterattack from her second skill, Tidecaller, after you've unlocked her 1st and 2nd passive talents. This will give you a 10 second window of increased damage from your normal and charged attacks.

skills.name: Oceanborne
skills.description:
Normal Attack

Performs up to 5 successive strikes.

Charged Attack

Drains Stamina over time to perform continuous slashes.
At end of the sequence, perform a more powerful slash.

Plunging Attack

Plunges from mid-air to strike the ground, damaging enemies along the path and dealing AoE DMG upon impact.

skills.name: Tidecaller
skills.description:
Nothing to worry about. Should anyone raise a hand against her or her men, she will avenge it ten-fold with sword and thunder.

Press

Accumulating the power of lightning, Beidou swings her blade forward fiercely, dealing Electro DMG.

Hold

Lifts her weapon up as a shield. Max DMG absorbed scales off Beidou's Max HP.
Attacks using the energy stored within the greatsword upon release or once this ability's duration expires, dealing Electro DMG. DMG dealt scales with the number of times Beidou is attacked in the skill's duration. The greatest DMG Bonus will be attained once this effect is triggered twice.
The shield possesses the following properties:
  • Has 250% Electro DMG Absorption Efficiency.
  • Applies the Electro element to Beidou upon activation.

skills.name: Stormbreaker
skills.description:
Recalling her slaying of the great beast Haishan. Beidou calls upon that monstrous strength and the lightning to create a Thunderbeast's Targe around herself.

Thunderbeast's Target

  • When Normal and Charged Attacks hit, they create a lightning discharge that can jump between enemies, dealing Electro DMG.
  • Increases the character's resistance to interruption, and decreases DMG taken.

passives.name: Retribution
passives.description: Counterattacking with Tidecaller at the precise moment when the character is hit grants the maximum DMG Bonus.

passives.name: Leviathan's Protection
passives.description:
Gain the following effects for 10s after unleashing Tidecaller with its maximum DMG Bonus:
  • DMG dealt by Normal and Charged Attacks is increased by 15%. ATK SPD of Normal and Charged Attacks is increased by 15%.
  • Greatly reduced delay before unleashing Charged Attacks.

passives.name: Conqueror of Tides
passives.description: Decreases all party member's swimming Stamina consumption by 20%.

constellations.name: Sea Beast's Scourge
constellations.description:
When Stormbreaker is used:
Creates a shield that absorbs up to 16% of Beidou's Max HP for 15s.
This shield absorbs Electro DMG 250% more effectively.

constellations.name: Upon the Turbulent Sea, the Thunder Arises
constellations.description: Stormbreaker's arc lightning can jump 2 additional targets.

constellations.name: Summoner of Storm
constellations.description:
Increases the Level of Tidecaller by 3.
\nMaximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Stunning Revenge
constellations.description: Within 10s of taking DMG, Beidou's Normal Attacks gain 20% additional Electro DMG.

constellations.name: Crimson Tidewalker
constellations.description:
Increase the Level of Stormbreaker by 3.
\nMaximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Bane of Evil
constellations.description: During the duration of Stormbreaker, the Electro RES of surrounding enemies is decreased by 15%.

name: Bennett
description: A righteous and good-natured adventurer from Mondstadt who's unfortunately extremely unlucky.

builds.name: Pyro Support
builds.description: This build focuses on empowering Bennett's burst skill by stacking Energy Recharge. Keep in mind that the bonus ATK given to his Elemental Burst skill only comes from Base ATK, not ATK%.

builds.name: Physical DPS
builds.description: This build empowers Bennett's physical damage output, ignoring his Elemental Skill completely. We're looking for the highest Base ATK possible to empower his Elemental Burst skill.

skills.name: Strike of Fortune
skills.description:
Normal Attack

Perform up to 5 rapid strikes.

Charged Attack

Consumes a certain amount of Stamina to unleash 2 rapid sword swings.

Plunging Attack

Plunges from mid-air to strike the ground below, damaging enemies along the path and dealing AoE DMG upon impact.

skills.name: Passion Overload
skills.description:
Bennett puts all his fire and passion for adventuring into his sword. Results may very based on how fired up he is.

Press

A single, swift flame strike that deals Pyro DMG.

Hold (Short)

Charges up, resulting in different effects when unleashed based on the Charge Level.

  • Level 1: Strikes twice, dealing Pyro DMG and launching enemies.
  • Level 2: Unleashes 3 consecutive attacks that deal impressive Pyro DMG, but the last attack triggers an explosion that launches both Bennet and the enemy.

Bennett takes no damage from being launched.

skills.name: Fantastic Voyage
skills.description:
Bennett leaps towards the enemy and performs a plunging attack, dealing Pyro DMG, creating an Inspiration Field.

Inspiration Field

  • If the health of a character in the circle is equal to or falls below 70%, their health will continuously regenerate. Regeneration scales based on Bennett's Max HP.
  • If the health of a character in the circle is higher than 70%, they gain an ATK Bonus that is based on Bennett's Base ATK.
  • Applies the Pyro element to characters within the Field.

passives.name: Rekindle
passives.description: Decreases Passion Overload's CD by 20%.

passives.name: Fearnaught
passives.description:
When inside the area created by Fantastic Voyage, Passion Overload takes on the following effects:
  • CD is reduced by 50%.
  • Bennett will not be launched by the effects of Charge Level 2.

passives.name: It Should Be Safe...
passives.description: When dispatched on an expedition in Mondstadt, time consumed is reduced by 25%.

constellations.name: Grand Expectation
constellations.description: Fantastic Voyage's ATK increases no longer has an HP restriction, and gains an additional 20% Base ATK.

constellations.name: Impasse Conqueror
constellations.description: When Bennett's HP falls below 70%, his Energy Recharge is increased by 30%.

constellations.name: Unstoppable Fervor
constellations.description:
Increases the Level of Passion Overload by 3.
\nMaximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Unexpected Odyssey
constellations.description: Using a Normal Attack when executing the second attack of Passion Overload's Charge Level 1 allows an additional attack to be performed. This additional attack does 135% of the second attack's DMG.

constellations.name: True Explorer
constellations.description:
Increase the Level of Fantastic Voyage by 3.
\nMaximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Fire Ventures with Me
constellations.description: Sword, Claymore, or Polearm-wielding characters inside Fantastic Voyage's radius gain a 15% Pyro DMG Bonus. Normal and Charged Attacks now do Pyro DMG.

name: Chongyun
description: A young exortcist from a family of exorcists. He does everything he can to suppress his pure positive energy.

builds.name: Cryo Support
builds.description: Melt is one of the strongest Elemental Reactions in the game and Chongyun has a consistent method of applying the Cryo debuff with his Elemental Skill ability. This makes him a strong support character when paired with Pyro carries.

builds.name: Cryo DPS
builds.description: While Chongyun can be built like other standard Claymore users with a Gladiator set, his true power comes from his Elemental Burst skill. A lot of his constellations also empower this ability. As such, this build piles on, making his Ultimate as strong as possible.

skills.name: Demonbane
skills.description:
Normal Attack

Performs up to 4 consecutive strikes.

Charged Attack

Drains Stamina over time to perform continuous swirling attacks against all nearby enemies.
At end of the sequence, perform a more powerful slash.

Plunging Attack

Plunges from mid-air to strike the ground below, damaging enemies along the path and dealing AoE DMG upon impact.

skills.name: Spirit Blade - Chonghua's Layered Frost
skills.description:
Chongyun strikes the ground with his greatsword, causing a Cryo explosion in a circular AoE in front of him that deals Cryo DMG.\n
\nAfter a short delay, the cold air created by the Cryo explosion will coalesce into a Chonghua Frost Field, within which all DMG done through Normal and Charged Attacks by Sword, Greatsword and Polearm-wielding characters will be converted to Cryo DMG.

skills.name: Spirit Blade - Cloud-parting Star
skills.description:
Performing the secret hand seals, Chongyun summons 3 giant spirit blades in mid-air that fall to the earth one by one after a short delay, exploding as they hit the ground.\n
\nWhen the spirit blades explode, they will deal AoE Cryo DMG and launch enemies.

passives.name: Steady Breathing
passives.description: Sword, Claymore, or Polearm-wielding characters within the field created by Spirit Blade - Chonghua's Layered Frost have their Normal Attack SPD increased by 8%.

passives.name: Rimechaser Blade
passives.description: When the field created by Spirit Blade - Chonghua's Layered Frost disappears, another spirit will be summoned to strike nearby enemies, dealing 100% of Chonghua's Layered Frost's Skill DMG as AoE Cryo DMG. Enemies hit by this blade will have their Cryo RES decreased by 10% for 8s.

passives.name: Gallant Journey
passives.description: When dispatched on an expedition in Liyue, time consumed is reduced by 25%.

constellations.name: Ice Unleashed
constellations.description: The last attack of Chongyun's Normal Attack combo releases 3 ice blades. Each blade deals 50% of Chongyun's ATK as Cryo DMG to all enemies in its path.

constellations.name: Atmospheric Revolution
constellations.description: Elemental Skills and Elemental Bursts cast within the Frost Field created by Spirit Blade - Chongyun's Layered Frost have their CD time decreased by 15%.

constellations.name: Cloudburst
constellations.description:
Increases the Level of Spirit Blade - Cloud-parting Star by 3.
\nMaximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Frozen Skies
constellations.description:
Chongyun regenerates 1 Energy every time he hits an enemy affected by Cold or Frozen status effects.\n
\nThis effect can only occur once every 2s.

constellations.name: The True Path
constellations.description:
Increases the level of Spirit Blade - Chongyun's Layered Frost by 3.
\nMaximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Rally of Four Blades
constellations.description:
Spirit Blade - Cloud-parting Star deals 15% more DMG to enemies with a lower percentage of their Max HP remaining than Chongyun.\n
\nThis skill will also summon 1 additional spirt blade.

name: Diluc
description: The tycoon of a winery empire in Mondstadt, unmatched in every possible way.

builds.name: Pyro DPS
builds.description: This build can work without any constellations, but really shines when you have all 6. At constellation level 6, Diluc becomes an unstoppable Pyro DMG dealing machine, weaving 2 normal attacks in between every Searing Onslaught hit.

showcase.description: This showcase features Zy0x with a massive 150k crit on Diluc. Zy0x is on a journey to reach over 100k damage on every single character.

skills.name: Tempered Sword
skills.description:
Normal Attack

Performs up to 4 consecutive strikes.

Charged Attack

Drains Stamina over time to perform continuous slashes.
At the end of the sequence, perform a more powerful slash.

Plunging Attack

Plunges from mid-air to strike the ground, damaging enemies along the path and dealing AoE DMG upon impact.

skills.name: Searing Onslaught
skills.description:
Performs a forward slash that deals Pyro DMG.

\n

This skill can be used 3 times consecutively. Enters CD if not cast again within a short period.

skills.name: Dawn
skills.description:
Releases intense flames to knock nearby enemies back, dealing Pyro DMG. The flames then converge into the weapon, summoning a Phoenix that flies forward and deals massive Pyro DMG to all enemies in its path. The Phoenix explodes upon reaching its destination, causing a large amount of AoE Pyro DMG.\n
\nThe searing flames that run down his blade cause Diluc's Normal and Charged Attacks to deal Pyro DMG for a time.

passives.name: Relentless
passives.description: Diluc's Charged Attack Stamina Cost is decreased by 50%, and its duration is increased by 3s.

passives.name: Blessing of Phoenix
passives.description: The Pyro Enchantment provided by Dawn lasts for 4s longer. Additionally, Diluc gains 20% Pyro DMG Bonus during the duration of this effect.

passives.name: Tradition of the Dawn Knight
passives.description: Refunds 15% of the ores used when crafting Claymore-type weapons.

constellations.name: Conviction
constellations.description: Diluc deals 15% more DMG to enemies whose HP is above 50%.

constellations.name: Searing Ember
constellations.description:
When Diluc takes DMG, his Base ATK increases by 10% and his ATK SPD increases by 5%. Lasts for 10s.\n
\nThis effect can stack up to 3 times and can only occur once every 1.5s.

constellations.name: Steel and Fire
constellations.description:
Increases the Level of Searing Onslaught by 3.
\nMaximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Flowing Flame
constellations.description:
Casting Searing Onslaught in sequence greatly increases damage dealt.\n
\nWithin 2s of using Searing Onslaught, casting the next Searing Onslaught in the combo deals 40% additional DMG. This effect lasts for the next 2s.

constellations.name: Phoenix, Harbinger of Dawn
constellations.description:
Increases the level of Dawn by 3.
\nMaximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Flaming Sword, Nemesis of Dark
constellations.description:
After casting Searing Onslaught, the next 2 Normal Attacks within the next 6s will have their DMG and ATK SPD increased by 30%.\n
\nAdditionally, Searing Onslaught will not interrupt the Normal Attack combo.

name: Diona
description: A young lady who has inherited trace amounts of non-human blood. She is the incredible popular bartender of the Cat's Tail tavern.

skills.name: Katzlein Style
skills.description:
Normal Attack

Performs up to 5 consecutive shots with a bow.

Charged Attack

Perform a more precise Aimed Shot with increased DMG.
While aiming, biting frost accumulates on the arrowhead. A fully charged frost arrow will deal Cryo DMG.

Plunging Attack

Fires off a shower of arrows in mid-air before falling and striking the ground, dealing AoE DMG upon impact.

skills.name: Icy Paws
skills.description:
Fires an Icy Paw that deals Cryo DMG to opponents and forms a shield on hit. The shield's DMG Absorption scales based on Diona's Max HP, and its duration scales off the number of Icy Paws that hit their target.

Press

Rapidly fires off 2 Icy Paws.

Hold

Dashes back quickly before firing five Icy Paws.
The shield created by a Hold attack will gain a 75% DMG Absorption Bonus.

The shield has a 250% Cryo DMG Absorption Bonus, and will cause your active character to become affected by Cryo at the point of formation for a short duration.

skills.name: Signature Mix
skills.description:
Tosses out a special cold brew that deals AoE Cryo DMG and creates a Drunken Mist in an AoE.

Drunken Mist

  • Deals continuous Cryo DMG to opponents within the AoE.
  • Continuously regenerates the HP of characters within the AoE.

passives.name: Cat's Tail Secret Menu
passives.description: Characters shielded by Icy Paws have their Movement SPD increased by 10% and their Stamina Consumption decreased by 10%.

passives.name: Drunkard's Farce
passives.description: Opponents who enter the AoE of Signature Mix have 10% decreased ATK for 15s.

passives.name: Complimentary Bar Food
passives.description: When a Perfect Cooking is achieved on a dish with restorative effects, there is a 12% chance to obtain double the product.

constellations.name: A Lingering Flavor
constellations.description: Regenerates 15 Energy for Diona after the effects of Signature Mix end.

constellations.name: Shaken, Not Purred
constellations.description: Increases Icy Paws' DMG by 15%, and increases its shield's DMG Absorption by 15%. Additionally, when paws hit their targets, creates a shield for other nearby characters on the field with 50% of the Icy Paws shield's DMG Absorption for 5s.

constellations.name: A-Another Round?
constellations.description:
Increases the Level of Signature Mix by 3.
\nMaximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Wine Industry Slayer
constellations.description: Within the radius of Signature Mix, Diona's charge time for aimed shots is reduced by 60%.

constellations.name: Double Shot, On The Rocks
constellations.description:
Increases the level of Icy Paws by 3.
\nMaximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Cat's Tail Closing Time
constellations.description:
Characters within Signature Mix's radius will gain the following effects based on their HP amounts:
  • Increasing Incoming Healing Bonus by 30% when HP falls below or is equal to 50%.
  • Elemental Mastery is increased by 200 when HP is above 50%.

name: Fischl
description: A mysterious girl who calls herself "Prinzessia der Verurteilung" and travels with a night raven named Oz.

builds.name: Electro Support
builds.description: This build empowers Fischl's Electro DMG on her skills. You could also use a full Noblesse Oblige set if you find yourself using her Elemental Burst very often. The Stringless is the preferred weapon.

builds.name: Physical DPS
builds.description: This build is more commonly known as machine gun Fischl and it takes advantage of all the additional procs of damage she gets on every hit by stacking ATK SPD and ATK.

skills.name: Bolts of Downfall
skills.description:
Normal Attack

Performs up to 5 consecutive shots with a bow.

Charged Attack

Perform a more precise Aimed Shot with increased DMG.
While aiming, the dark lightning spirits of Immernachtreich shall heed the call of their Prinzessin and indwell the enchanted arrowhead. When fully indwelt, the Rachsuchtig Blitz shall deal immense Electro DMG.

Plunging Attack

Fires off a shower of arrows in mid-air before falling and striking the ground, dealing AoE DMG upon impact.

skills.name: Nightrider
skills.description:
Summons Oz, the night raven forged of darkness and lightning descends upon the land, dealing Electro DMG in a small AoE.
For the ability's duration, Oz will continuously attack nearby enemies with Freikugel.

Hold to adjust the location Oz will be summoned to.
Press again any time during the ability's duration to once again summon him to Fischl's side.

skills.name: Midnight Phantasmagoria
skills.description:
Summons Oz to spread his twin swings of twilight and defend Fischl.
Has the following properties during the ability's duration:
  • Fischl takes on Oz's form, greatly increasing her Movement Speed.
  • Strikes nearby enemies with lightning, dealing Electro DMG to enemies she comes into contact with. Each enemy can only be struck once.
  • Once this ability's effects end, Oz will remain on the battlefield and attack his Prinzessin's foes. If Oz is already on the field, then this will reset the duration of his presence.

passives.name: Stellar Predator
passives.description: When Fischl hits Oz with a fully-charged Aimed Shot, Oz brings down Thundering Retribution, dealing AoE Electro DMG equal to 152.7% of the arrow's DMG.

passives.name: Lightning Smite
passives.description: If a character triggers an Electro-related Elemental Reaction when Oz is on the field, the enemy shall be stricken with Thundering Retribution, dealing Electro DMG equal to 80% of Fischl's ATK.

passives.name: Mein Hausgarten
passives.description: When dispatched on an expedition in Mondstadt, time consumed is reduced by 25%.

constellations.name: Gaze of the Deep
constellations.description: Even when Oz is not present in combat, he can still watch over Fischl through his raven eyes. When Fischl attacks an enemy, Oz fires a joint attack, dealing 22% of ATK DMG.

constellations.name: Devourer of All-Sins
constellations.description: When Nightrider is used, it deals an additional 200% ATK as DMG, and its AoE is increased by 50%.

constellations.name: Wings of Nightmare
constellations.description:
Increases the Level of Nightrider by 3.
\nMaximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Her Pilgrimage of Bleak
constellations.description:
When Midnight Phatasmagoria is used, it deals 222% of ATK as Electro DMG to surrounding enemies.\n
\nWhen the skill duration ends, Fischl regenerates 20% of her HP.

constellations.name: Against the Fleeing Light
constellations.description:
Increase the Level of Midnight Phantasmagoria by 3.
\nMaximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Evernight Raven
constellations.description: Increases the duration of Oz's summoning by 2s. Additionally, Oz attacks with the current character when present, dealing 30% of Fischl's ATK as Electro DMG.

name: Jean
description: The righteous and rigorous Dandelion Knight, and Acting Grand Master of the Knights of Favonius in Mondstadt.

builds.name: Anemo Support
builds.description: This build empowers Jean's Elemental Burst ability to maximize her healing, while simultaneously reducing enemies' Elemental RES for the rest of your party.

builds.name: Physical DPS
builds.description: This build empowers Jean's physical damage output, turning her into a reliable hybrid between a DPS and a healer.

skills.name: Favonius Bladework
skills.description:
Normal Attack

Performs up to 5 consecutive strikes.

Charged Attack

Consumes a certain amount of Stamina to launch an enemy using the power of wind.
Launched enemies will slowly fall to the ground.

Plunging Attack

Plunges from mid-air to strike the ground below, damaging enemies along the path and dealing AoE DMG upon impact.

skills.name: Gale Blade
skills.description:
Focusing the might of the formless wind around her blade, Jean releases a miniature storm, launching enemies in the direction she aims at, dealing massive Anemo DMG.

Hold

At the cost of continued Stamina consumption, Jean can command the whirlwind to pull surrounding enemies towards her front.
Direction can be adjusted.
Character is immobile during skill duration.

skills.name: Dandelion Breeze
skills.description:
Calling upon the wind's protection, Jean creates a swirling Dandelion Field, launching surrounding enemies and causing Anemo DMG.
At the same time, she instantly regenerates a large amount of HP for nearby allied units and all party members. HP restored scale off Jean's ATK.

Dandelion Field

  • Continuously regenerates HP for one ally and imbues them with the Anemo attribute.
  • Deals Anemo DMG to enemies entering or exiting the field.

passives.name: Wind Companion
passives.description: Hits by Normal Attacks have a 50% chance to regenerate HP equal to 15% of Jean's ATK for all party members.

passives.name: Let the Wind Lead
passives.description: Using Dandelion Breeze will regenerate 20% of its Energy.

passives.name: Guiding Breeze
passives.description: When a Perfect Cooking is achieved on a dish with restorative effects, there is a 12% chance to obtain double the product.

constellations.name: Spiraling Tempest
constellations.description: Increases the pulling speed of Gale Blade after holding for more than 1s, and increases the DMG dealt by 40%.

constellations.name: People's Aegis
constellations.description: When Jean picks up an Elemental Orb/Particle, all party members have their Movement SPD and ATK SPD increased by 15% for 15s.

constellations.name: When the West Wind Arises
constellations.description:
Increases the Level of Dandelion Breeze by 3.
\nMaximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Lands of Dandelion
constellations.description: Within the Field created by Dandelion Breeze, all enemies have their Anemo RES decreased by 40%.

constellations.name: Outbursting Gust
constellations.description:
Increase the Level of Gale Blade by 3.
\nMaximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Lion's Fang, Fair Protector of Mondstadt
constellations.description: Incoming DMG is decreased by 35% within the Field created by Dandelion Breeze. Upon leaving the Dandelion Field, this effect lasts for 3 attacks or 10s.

name: Kaeya
description: A thinker in the Knights of Favonius with a somewhat exotic appearance.

builds.name: Cryo Support
builds.description: This build empowers Kaeya's Elemental Burst ability which procs multiple times, leading to very consistent elemental reactions and damage. This build becomes much more powerful with Constellation level 6.

skills.name: Ceremonial Bladework
skills.description:
Normal Attack

Performs up to 5 consecutive strikes.

Charged Attack

Consumes a certain amount of Stamina to unleash 2 rapid sword strikes.

Plunging Attack

Plunges from mid-air to strike the ground below, damaging enemeies along the path and dealing AoE DMG upon impact.

skills.name: Frostgnaw
skills.description: Unleashes a frigit blast, dealing Cryo DMG to enemies in front of Kaeya.

skills.name: Glacial Waltz
skills.description:
Coalescing the frost in the air, Kaeya summons 3 icicles that revolve around him.\n
\nThese icicles will follow the character around and deal Cryo DMG to enemies in their path for so long as they persist.

passives.name: Cold-Blooded Strike
passives.description: Every hit with Frostgnaw regenerates HP for Kaeya equal to 15% of ATK.

passives.name: Heart of the Abyss
passives.description:
Enemies Frozen by Frostgnaw will drop additional Elemental Particles.\n
\nFrostgnaw may only produce a maximum of 2 additional Elemental Particles per use.

passives.name: Hidden Strength
passives.description: Decreases all party member's sprinting Stamina consumption by 20%.

constellations.name: Excellent Blood
constellations.description: The CRIT Rate of Normal Attack and Charged Attack DMG against enemies affected by the Cold or Frozen status effects is increased by 15%.

constellations.name: Never-Ending Performance
constellations.description: Every time Glacial Waltz defeats an enemy, its duration is increased by 2.5s, up to a maximum of 15s.

constellations.name: Dance of Frost
constellations.description:
Increases the Level of Frostgnaw by 3.
\nMaximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Frozen Kiss
constellations.description:
Triggers automatically when Kaeya's HP falls below 20%:
Creates a shield that absorbs damage equal to 30% of Kaeya's Max HP. Lasts for 20s.
This shield absorbs Cryo DMG with 250% efficiency.
Can only occur once every 60s.

constellations.name: Frostbiting Embrace
constellations.description:
Increase the Level of Glacial Waltz by 3.
\nMaximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Glacial Whirlwind
constellations.description: Glacial Waltz will generate 1 additional icicle, and will regenerate 15 Energy when cast.

name: Keqing
description: The Yuheng of the Liyue Qixing. Has much to say about Rex Lapis' unilateral approach to policymaking in Liyue - but in truth, gods admire skeptics such as her quite a lot.

builds.name: Electro DPS
builds.description: Keqing has the highest single target charged attack DPS in the game. This build turns Keqing into a crit machine, taking advantage of the boost to CRIT DMG she gets with every ascension level.

skills.name: Yunlai Swordsmanship
skills.description:
Normal Attack

Performs up to 5 rapid strikes.

Charged Attack

Consumes a certain amount of Stamina to unleash 2 rapid sword strikes.

Plunging Attack

Plunges from mid-air to strike the ground below, damaging enemeies along the path and dealing AoE DMG upon impact.

skills.name: Stellar Restoration
skills.description:
Hurls a Lightning Stiletto that annihilates her enemies like the swift thunder.
When the Stiletto hits its target, it deals Electro DMG to enemies in a small AoE, and places a Stiletto Mark on the spot hit.

Hold

Hold to adjust the direction in which the Stiletto shall be thrown.
Stilettos thrown by the Hold attack mode can be suspended in mid-air, allowing Keqing to jump to them when using Stellar Restoration a second time.

Lightning Stiletto

If Keqing uses Stellar Restoration again or uses a Charged Attack while its duration lasts, it will clear the Stiletto Mark and produce different effects:
  • If she uses Stellar Restoration again, she will blink to the location of the Mark and unleashed one slashing attack that deals AoE Electro DMG. When blinking to a Stiletto that was thrown from a Holding attack, Keqing can leap across obstructing terrain.
  • If Keqing uses a Charged Attack, she will ignite a series of thundering cuts at the Mark's location, dealing AoE Electro DMG.

skills.name: Starward Sword
skills.description:
Keqing unleashes the power of lightning, dealing Electro DMG in an AoE.

\n

She then blends into the shadow of her blade, striking a series of thunderclap-blows to nearby enemies simultaneous that deal multiple instance of Electro DMG. The final attack deals massive AoE Electro DMG.

passives.name: Thundering Penance
passives.description: Within 5s of recasting Stellar Restoration while a Lightning Stiletto is present, Keqing's Normal and Charged Attacks are converted to Electro DMG.

passives.name: Aristocratic Dignity
passives.description: When casting Starward Sword, Keqing's CRIT Rate is increased by 15%, and her Energy Recharge is increased by 15%. This effect lasts for 8s.

passives.name: Land's Overseer
passives.description: When dispatched on an expedition in Liyue, time consumed is reduced by 25%.

constellations.name: Thundering Might
constellations.description: Recasting Stellar Restoration while a Lightning Stiletto is present causes Keqing to deal 50% of her ATK as AoE Electro DMG at the start point and terminus of her Blink.

constellations.name: Keen Extraction
constellations.description: When Keqing's Normal and Charged Attack's hit enemies affected by Electro, they have a 50% chance of producing an Elemental Particle. This effect can only  occur once every 5s.

constellations.name: Forseen Reformation
constellations.description:
Increases the Level of Starward Sword by 3.
\nMaximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Attunement
constellations.description: For 10s after Keqing triggers an Electro-related Elemental Reaction, her ATK is increased by 25%.

constellations.name: Beckoning Stars
constellations.description:
Increase the Level of Stellar Restoration by 3.
\nMaximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Tenacious Star
constellations.description: When initiating a Normal Attack, Charged Attack, Elemental Skill or Elemental Burst, Keqing gains a 6% Electro DMG Bonus for 8s. Effects triggered by Normal Attacks, Charged Attacks, Elemental Skills and Elemental Bursts are considered independent entities.

name: Klee
description: An explosives expert and a regular at the Knights of Favonius' confinement room. Also known as Fleeing Sunlight.

builds.name: Pyro DPS
builds.description: Klee's highest damage source comes from spamming her charged attack and she really comes online when paired with Bennet's ultimate, more so than Diluc.

skills.name: Kaboom!
skills.description:
Normal Attack

Throws things that go boom when they hit things! Perform up to 3 explosive attacks, dealing AoE Pyro DMG.

Charged Attack

Consumes a certain amount of Stamina and deals Pyro DMG to enemies after a short casting time.

Plunging Attack

Gathering the power of Pyro, Klee plunges towards the ground from mid-air, damaging all enemies in her path. Deals AoE Pyro DMG upon impact with the ground.

skills.name: Jumpy Dumpty
skills.description:
Jumpy Dumpty is tons of boom-bang-fun!
When thrown, Jumpy Dumpty bounces thrice, igniting and dealing AoE Pyro DMG with every bounce.

On the third bounce, the bomb splits into many mines.
The mines will explode upon contact with enemies, or after a short period of time, dealing AoE Pyro DMG.

Starts with 2 charges.

skills.name: Sparks 'n' Splash
skills.description: Klee's Blazing Delight! For the duration of this ability, continuously summons Sparks 'n' Splash to attack nearby enemies, dealing AoE Pyro DMG.

passives.name: Pounding Surprise
passives.description: When Jumpy Dumpty and Normal Attacks deal DMG, Klee has a 50% chance to obtain an Explosive Spark. This Explosive Spark is consumed by the next Charged Attack, which costs no Stamina and deals 50% increased DMG.

passives.name: Sparkling Burst
passives.description: When a Charged Attack results in a CRIT, all party members gain 2 Elemental Energy.

passives.name: All Of My Treasures!
passives.description: Displays the location of nearby resources unique to Mondstadt on the mini-map.

constellations.name: Chained Reaction
constellations.description: Attacks and Skills have a certain chance to summon a spark that bombards enemies, dealing DMG equal to 120% of Sparks 'n' Splash's DMG.

constellations.name: Explosive Frags
constellations.description: Being hit by Jumpy Dumpty's mines decreases enemy DEF by 23% for 10s.

constellations.name: Exquisite Compound
constellations.description:
Increases the Level of Jumpy Dumpty by 3.
\nMaximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Sparkly Explosion
constellations.description: If Klee leaves the field during the duration of Sparks 'n' Splash, her departure triggers an explosion that deals 555% of her ATK as AoE Pyro DMG.

constellations.name: Nova Burst
constellations.description:
Increase the Level of Sparks 'n' Splash by 3.
\nMaximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Blazing Delight
constellations.description:
While under the effects of Sparks 'n' Splash, other members of the party will continuously regenerate Energy.\n
\nWhen Sparks 'n' Splash is used, all party members will gain 10% Pyro DMG Bonus for 25s.

name: Lisa
description: The languid but knowledgeable Librarian of the Knights of Favonius who was deemed by Sumeru Academia to be their most distinguised graduate in the past two centuries.

builds.name: Electro Support
builds.description: This build empower's Lisa's Elemental Burst abilty. It would be much stronger if it didn't knock enemies out of it, but it can be very powerful on bosses.

skills.name: Lightning Touch
skills.description:
Normal Attack

Perform up to 4 lightning attacks that deal Electro DMG.

Charged Attack

Consumes a certain amount of Stamina to deal AoE Electro DMG after a short casting time.

Plunging Attack

Gathering the might of Electro, Lisa plunges towards the ground from mid-air, damaging all enemies in her path. Deals AoE Electro DMG upon impact with the ground.

skills.name: Violet Arc
skills.description:
Channels the power of lightning to sweep bothersome matters away.

Press

Releases a homing Lightning Orb. On hit, it deals Electro DMG, and applies a stack of Conductive status (Max 3 stacks) to enemies in a small AoE.

Hold

After an extended casting time, calls down lightning from the heavens, dealing massive Electro DMG to all nearby enemies.
Deals great amounts of extra damage to enemies based on the number of Conductive stacks applied to them, and clears their Conductive status.

skills.name: Lightning Rose
skills.description:
Summons a Lightning Rose that unleashes powerful lightning bolts, launching surrounding enemies and dealing Electro DMG.\n
\nThe Lightning Rose will continuously emit lightning to knock back enemies and deal Electro DMG for so long as it persists.

passives.name: Induced Aftershock
passives.description: Hits by charged Attacks apply Violet Arc's Conductive status to enemies.

passives.name: Static Electricity Field
passives.description: Enemies hit by Lightning Rose have their DEF decreased by 15% for 10s.

passives.name: General Pharmaceutics
passives.description: When Lisa crafts a potion, she has a 20% chance to refund a portion of the crafting materials used.

constellations.name: Infinite Circuit
constellations.description:
Lisa recovers 2 Energy for every opponent hit while holding Violet Arc.\n
\nA maximum of 10 Energy can be regenerated in this manner at any one time.

constellations.name: Electromagnetic Field
constellations.description:
Holding Violet Arc has the following effects:
  • Increases DEF by 25%.
  • Increases Lisa's resistance to interruption.

constellations.name: Resonant Thunder
constellations.description:
Increases the Level of Lightning Rose by 3.
\nMaximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Plasma Eruption
constellations.description: Increases the number of lightning bolts released by Lightning Rose by 1-3.

constellations.name: Electrocute
constellations.description:
Increase the Level of Violet Arc by 3.
\nMaximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Pulsating Witch
constellations.description:
When Lisa takes the field, she applies 3 stacks of Violet Arc's Conductive status onto nearby enemies.\n
\nThis effect can only occur once every 5s.

name: Mona
description: A mysterious young astrologer who proclaims herself to be "Astrologist Mona Megistus," and who possesses abilities to match the title.

builds.name: Hydro Support
builds.description: Mona excels at empowering DPS units through the use of her Burst Skill making energy recharge incredibly valuable.

skills.name: Ripple of Fate
skills.description:
Normal Attack

Performs up to 4 water splash attacks that deal Hydro DMG.

Charged Attack

Consumes a certain amount of Stamina and deals AoE Hydro DMG after a short casting time.

Plunging Attack

Gathering the might of Hydro, Mona plunges towards the ground from mid-air, damaging all enemies in her path. Deals AoE Hydro DMG upon impact with the ground.

skills.name: Reflection of Doom
skills.description:
Creates an illusory Phantom of fate from coalesced waterspouts.
The Phantom has the following special properties:

  • Continuously taunts nearby enemies, attracting their fire.
  • Continuously deals Hydro DMG to nearby enemies.
  • When its duration expires, the Phantom explodes, dealing AoE Hydro DMG.

Hold

Utilizes water currents to move backwards swiftly before conjuring a Phantom.
Only one Phantom created by Mirror Reflection of Doom can exist at any time.

skills.name: Stellaris Phantasm
skills.description:
Mona summons the sparkling waves and creates a reflection of the starry sky, applying the Illusory Bubble status to opponents in a large AoE.

Illusory Bubble

Traps opponents inside a pocket of destiny and also makes them Wet. Renders weaker opponents immobile. When an opponent affected by Illusory Bubble sustains DMG, the following effects are produced:

  • Applies an Omen to the opponent, which gives a DMG Bonus, also increasing the DMG of the attack that causes it.
  • Removes the Illusory Bubble, dealing Hydro Elemental DMG in the process. The DMG Bonus does not apply to the Hydro Elemental DMG dealt in this instance.

Omen

During its duration, increases DMG taken by enemies.

skills.name: Illusory Torrent
skills.description:
Alternate Spirit

Mona cloaks herself within the water's flow, consuming Stamina to move rapidly.
When under the effect of Illusory Torrent, Mona can move at high speed on water.
Applies the Wet status to nearby enemies when she reappears.

passives.name: Come 'n' Get Me, Hag!
passives.description:
After she has used Illusory Torrent for 2s, if there are any enemies nearby, Mona will automatically create a Phantom.\n
\nA Phantom created in this manner lasts for 2s, and its explosion DMG is equal to 50% of Mirror Reflection of Doom.

passives.name: Waterborne Destiny
passives.description: Increases Mona's Hydro DMG Bonus by a degree equivalent to 20% of her Energy Recharge rate.

passives.name: Principium of Astrology
passives.description: When Mona crafts Weapon Ascension Materials, she has a 25% chance to refund a portion of the crafting materials used.

constellations.name: Prophecy of Submersion
constellations.description:
The effects of Hydro-related Elemental Reactions are enhanced for 8s after a character hits an enemy affected by an Omen:
  • Electro-Charged DMG is increased by 15%.
  • Vaporize DMG is increased by 15%.
  • Hydro Swirl DMG is increased by 15%.
  • The duration for which enemies are Frozen is increased by 15%.

constellations.name: Lunar Chain
constellations.description:
When a Normal Attack hits, there is a 20% chance that it will be automatically followed by a Charged Attack.\n
\nThis effect can only occur once every 5s.

constellations.name: Restless Revolution
constellations.description:
Increases the Level of Stellaris Phantasm by 3.
\nMaximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Prophecy of Oblivion
constellations.description: When a character attacks an enemy affected by the Omen status effect, their CRIT Rate is increased by 15%.

constellations.name: Mockery of Fortuna
constellations.description:
Increase the Level of Mirror Reflection of Doom by 3.
\nMaximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Rhetorics of Calamitas
constellations.description:
Upon entering Illusory Torrent, Mona gain a 60% increase to the DMG her next Charged Attack per second of movement.\n
\nA maximum DMG Bonus of 180% can be achieved in this manner. The effect lasts for no more than 8s.

name: Ningguang
description: The Tianquan of Liyue Qixing. Her wealth is unsurpassed in all of Teyvat.

builds.name: Geo DPS
builds.description: Ningguang is a character that scales extremely well with high constellation levels, making her one of the burstier single target units in the game.

skills.name: Sparkling Scatter
skills.description:
Normal Attack

Shoots gems that deal Geo DMG.
Upon hit, this grants Ningguang 1 Star Jade.

Charged Attack

Consumes a certain amount of Stamina to fire off a giant gem that deals Geo DMG.
If Ningguang has any Star Jades, unleashing a Charged Attack will cause the Star Jades to be fired at the enemy as well, dealing additional DMG.

Plunging Attack

Gathering the might of Geo, Ningguang plunges towards the ground from mid-air, damaging all enemies in her path. Deals AoE Geo DMG upon impact with the ground.

skills.name: Jade Screen
skills.description:
Ningguang creates a Jade Screen out of gold, obsidian and her great opulence, dealing AoE Geo DMG.

Jade Screen

  • Blocks enemy projectiles.
  • Endurance scales based on Ningguang's Max HP.

Jade Screen is considered a Geo Construct and can be used to block certain attacks, but cannot be climbed. Only one Jade Screen may exist at any one time.

skills.name: Starshatter
skills.description:
Gathering a great number of gems, Ningguang scatters them all at once, sending homing projectiles at her enemies that deal massive Geo DMG.\n
\nIf Starshatter is cast when a Jade Screen is nearby, the Jade Screen will fire additional gem projectiles at the same time.

passives.name: Backup Plan
passives.description: When Ningguang is in possession of Star Jades, her Charged Attack does not consume Stamina.

passives.name: Strategic Reserve
passives.description: A character that passes through the Jade Screen will gain a 12% Geo DMG Bonus for 10s.

passives.name: Trove of Marvelous Treasure
passives.description: Displays the location of nearby ore veins (Iron Ore, White Iron Ore, Crystal Ore, and Magical Crystal Ore) on the mini-map.

constellations.name: Piercing Fragments
constellations.description: When a Normal Attack hits, it deals AoE DMG.

constellations.name: Shock Effect
constellations.description:
When Jade Screen is shattered, its CD will reset.\n
\nCan occur once every 6s.

constellations.name: Majesty be the Array of Stars
constellations.description:
Increases the Level of Starshatter by 3.
\nMaximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Exquisite be the Jade, Outshining All the Beneath
constellations.description: Jade Screen increases nearby characters' Elemental RES by 10%.

constellations.name: Invincible be the Jade Screen
constellations.description:
Increase the Level of Jade Screen by 3.
\nMaximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Grandeur be the Seven Stars
constellations.description: When Starshatter is used, Ningguang gains 7 Star Jades.

name: Noelle
description: A maid in the service of the Knights of Favonius that dreams of joining their ranks someday.

builds.name: Geo Support
builds.description: Noelle can be used a great defensive healer. The Maiden Beloved artifact set helps boost her lower healing throughput to be more comparable to other healers.

builds.name: Geo DPS
builds.description: This is a build that really comes online when you unlock Noelle's 6th constellation, allowing her to convert a large portion of her DEF to ATK.

skills.name: Favonius Bladework - Maid
skills.description:
Normal Attack

Performs up to 4 consecutive strikes.

Charged Attack

Drains Stamina over time to perform continuous swirling attacks against all nearby enemies.
At end of the sequence, perform a more powerful slash.

Plunging Attack

Plunges from mid-air to strike the ground below, damaging enemies along the path and dealing AoE DMG upon impact.

skills.name: Breastplate
skills.description:
Summons a protective stone armor, dealing Geo DMG to surrounding enemies and creating a shield. The shield's DMG Absorption scaled based on Noelle's DEF.
The shield has the following properties:
  • When Noelle's Normal and Charged Attacks hit a target, they have a certain chance to regenerate HP for all characters, both on and off the field.
  • Applies the Geo element to the character.
  • Possesses 250% Absorption Efficiency against Geo DMG.
The amount of HP healed when regeneration is triggered scales based on Noelle's DEF.

skills.name: Sweeping Time
skills.description:
Gathering the strength of stone around her weapon, Noelle strikes the enemies surrounding her within a large AoE, dealing Geo DMG.
Afterwards, Noelle gains the following effects:
  • Larger attack AoE.
  • Converts attack DMG to Geo DMG.
  • Increased ATK that scales based on her DEF.

passives.name: Devotion
passives.description:
When Noelle is in the party but not on the field, this ability triggers automatically when the active character's HP falls below 30%:\n
\nCreates a shield that lasts for 20s and absorbs DMG equal to 400% of Noelle's DEF. This effect can only occur once every 60s.

passives.name: Nice and Clean
passives.description:
Every 4 Normal or Charged Attack hits will decrease the CD of Breastplate by 1s.\n
\nHitting multiple enemies with a single attack is only counted as 1 hit.

passives.name: Maid's Knighthood
passives.description: When a Perfect Cooking is achieved on a DEF-boosting dish, Noelle has a 12% chance to obtain double the product.

constellations.name: I Got Your Back
constellations.description: While Sweeping Time and Breastplate are both in effect, the chance of Breastplate's healing effects activating is increased to 100%.

constellations.name: Combat Maid
constellations.description: Decreases the Stamina Consumption of Noelle's Charged Attacks by 20% and increases her Charged Attack DMG by 15%.

constellations.name: Invulnerable Maid
constellations.description:
Increases the Level of Breastplate by 3.
\nMaximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: To Be Cleaned
constellations.description: When Breastplate's duration expires or it is destroyed by DMG, it will deal 400% ATK of Geo DMG to surrounding enemies.

constellations.name: Favonius Sweeper Master
constellations.description:
Increase the Level of Sweeping Time by 3.
\nMaximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Must Be Spotless
constellations.description:
Sweeping Time increases Noelle's ATK by an additional 50% of her DEF.\n
\nAdditionally, every enemy defeated during the skill's duration adds 1s to the duration, up to 10s.

name: Qiqi
description: An apprentice and herb-picker Bubu Pharmacy. An undead with a bone-white complexion, she seldom has much in the way of words or emotion.

builds.name: Cryo Healer
builds.description: Qiqi is the ultimate healing support thanks to her powerful healing and Cryo damage while not active.

skills.name: Ancient Sword Art
skills.description:
Normal Attack

Performs up to 5 rapid strikes.

Charged Attack

Consumes a certain amount of Stamina to unleash 2 rapid sword strikes.

Plunging Attack

Plunges from mid-air to strike the ground below, damaging enemies along the path and dealing AoE DMG upon impact.

skills.name: Adeptus Art: Herald of Frost
skills.description:
Using the Icevein Talisman, Qiqi brings forth the Herald of Frost, dealing Cryo DMG to nearby enemies.

Herald of Frost

  • When Qiqi hits a target with her Normal or Charged Attacks, she regenerates HP for all party members and all nearby allied characters. Healing scales based on Qiqi's ATK.
  • Regenerates HP for current character at regular intervals.
  • Follows the character around, dealing Cryo DMG to enemies in its path.

skills.name: Adeptus Art: Preserver of Fortune
skills.description:
Qiqi releases the adeptus power sealed within her body, marking nearby enemies with a Fortune-Preserving Talisman that deals Cryo DMG.

\n

Fortune-Preserving Talisman

\nWhen enemies affected by this Talisman take DMG, the character that dealt this DMG regenerates HP.

passives.name: Life-Prolonging Methods
passives.description: When a character under the effects of Adeptus Art: Herald of Frost triggers an Elemental Reaction, their Incoming Healing Bonus is increased by 20% for 8s.

passives.name: A Glimpse into Arcanum
passives.description: When Qiqi hits enemies with her Normal and Charged Attacks, she has a 50% chance to apply a Fortune-Preserving Talisman to them for 6s. This effect can only occur once every 30s.

passives.name: Former Life Memories
passives.description: Displays the location of nearby resources unique to Liyue on the mini-map.

constellations.name: Ascetics of Frost
constellations.description: When the Herald of Frost hits an enemy marked by a Fortune-Preserving Talisman, Qiqi regenerates 2 Energy.

constellations.name: Frozen to the Bone
constellations.description: Qiqi's Normal and Charge Attack DMG against enemies affected by Cryo is increased by 15%.

constellations.name: Ascendant Praise
constellations.description:
Increases the Level of Adeptus Art: Preserver of Fortune by 3.
\nMaximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Divine Suppression
constellations.description: Targets marked by the Fortune-Preserving Talisman have their ATK decreased by 20%.

constellations.name: Crimson Lotus Bloom
constellations.description:
Increase the Level of Adeptus Art: Herald of Frost by 3.
\nMaximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Rite of Resurrection
constellations.description:
Using Adeptus Art: Preserve of Fortune revives all nearby fallen characters and regenerates 50% of their HP.\n
\nThis effect can only occur once every 15 mins.

name: Razor
description: A boy who lives among the wolves in Wolvendom of Mondstadt, away from human civilization. As agile as lightning.

builds.name: Physical DPS
builds.description: This build empowers Razor's physical damage output, synergising with the bonuses from his Lightning Fang burst skill.

showcase.description: This showcase features Zy0x showing the many variations of Razor builds with his recommendations. Zy0x is on a journey to reach over 100k damage on every single character.

skills.name: Steel Fang
skills.description:
Normal Attack

Performs up to 4 consecutive strikes.

Charged Attack

Drains Stamina over time to perform continuous swirling attacks against all nearby enemies.
At end of the sequence, perform a more powerful slash.

Plunging Attack

Plunges from mid-air to strike the ground below, damaging enemies along the path and dealing AoE DMG upon impact.

skills.name: Claw and Thunder
skills.description:
Hunts his prey using the techniques taught to him by his master and his Lupical.

Press

Swings the Thunder Wolf Claw, dealing Electro DMG to enemies in front of Razor.
Upon striking an enemy, Razor will gain an Electro Sigil, which increases his Energy Recharge rate.
Razor can have up to 3 Electro Sigils simultaneously, and gaining a new Electro Sigil refreshes their duration.

Hold

Gathers Electro energy to unleash a lightning storm over a small AoE, causing massive Electro DMG, and clears all of Razor's Electro Sigils.
Each Electro Sigil cleared in this manner will be converted into Energy for Razor.

skills.name: Lightning Fang
skills.description:
Summons the Wolf Within which deals Electro DMG to all nearby opponents. This clears all of Razor's Electro Sigils, which will be converted into elemental energy for him.
The Wolf Within will fight alongside Razor for the skill's duration.

The Wolf Within

  • Strikes alongside Razor's normal attacks, dealing Electro DMG.
  • Raises Razor's ATK SPD and Electro RES.
  • Causes Razor to be immune to DMG inflicted by the Electro-Charged status.
  • Disables Razor's Charged Attacks.

The effects end when Razor leaves the battlefield.
When Razor leaves the field, a maximum of 10 Energy will be returned to him based off the duration remaining on this skill.

passives.name: Awakening
passives.description:
Decreases Claw and Thunder's CD by 18%.\n
\nUsing Lightning Fang resets the CD of Claw and Thunder.

passives.name: Hunger
passives.description: When Razor's Energy is below 50%, increases Energy Recharge by 30%.

passives.name: Wolvensprint
passives.description: Decreases all party member's sprinting Stamina Consumption by 20%.

constellations.name: Wolf's Instinct
constellations.description: Picking up an Elemental Orb or Particle increases Razor's DMG by 10% for 8s.

constellations.name: Suppression
constellations.description: Increases CRIT Rate against enemies with less than 30% HP by 10%.

constellations.name: Soul Companion
constellations.description:
Increases the Level of Lightning Fang by 3.
\nMaximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Bite
constellations.description: When casting Claw and Thunder (Press), enemies hit will have their DEF decreased by 15% for 7s.

constellations.name: Sharpened Claws
constellations.description:
Increase the Level of Claw and Thunder by 3.
\nMaximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Lupus Fulguris
constellations.description:
Every 10s, Razor's sword charges up, causing the next Normal Attack to release lightning that deals 100% of Razor's ATK as Electro DMG.\n
\nWhen Razor is not using Lightning Fang, a lightning strike on an enemy will grant Razor an Electro Sigil for Claw and Thunder.

name: Sucrose
description: An alchemist filled with curiosity about all things. She researches bio-alchemy.

builds.name: Anemo Support
builds.description: This build turns Sucrose's into an Elemental Mastery battery, increasing this stat as much as possible to share it with her party members.

skills.name: Wind Spirit Creation
skills.description:
Normal Attack

Performs up to 4 attacks using Wind Spirits, dealing Anemo DMG.

Charged Attack

Consumes a certain amount of Stamina and deals AoE Anemo DMG after a short casting time.

Plunging Attack

Calling upon the power of her Wind Spirits, Sucrose plunges towards the ground from mid-air, damaging all enemies in her path. Deals AoE Anemo DMG upon impact with the ground.

skills.name: Astable Anemohypostasis Creation - 6308
skills.description: Creates a small Wind Spirit that deals Anemo DMG to enemies in an AoE, pulling them towards the location of the Wind Spirit before launching them.

skills.name: Forbidden Creation - Isomer 75 / Type II
skills.description:
Sucrose hurls an unstable concoction that creates a Large Wind Spirit. While it persists, the Large Wind Spirit will continuously pull and launch nearby enemies, dealing AoE Anemo DMG.

Elemental Absorption

If the Wind Spirit comes into contact with Hydro / Pyro / Cryo / Electro elements, it will deal additional DMG of that type.
Elemental Absorption may only occur once per use.

passives.name: Catalyst Conversion
passives.description: When Sucrose triggers a Swirl effect, characters in the party with the matching element have their Elemental Mastery increased by 50 for 8s.

passives.name: Mollis Favonius
passives.description: When Astable Anemohypostatis Creation - 6308 or Forbidden Creation - Isomer 75 / Type II hit an enemy, increases other party member's Elemental Mastery based on 20% of Sucrose's Elemental Mastery for 8s.

passives.name: Astable Invention
passives.description: When Sucrose crafts Character and Weapon Enhancement Materials, she has a 10% to obtain double the product.

constellations.name: Clustered Vacuum Field
constellations.description: Astable Anemohypostasis Creation - 6308 gains 1 additional charge.

constellations.name: Beth - Unbound Form
constellations.description: The duration of Forbidden Creation - Isomer 75 / Type II is increased by 2s.

constellations.name: Flawless Alchemistress
constellations.description:
Increases the Level of Astable Anemohypostasis Creation - 6308 by 3.
\nMaximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Alchemania
constellations.description: Every 7 Normal and Charged Attacks, Sucrose will reduce the CD of Astable Anemohypostasis Creation - 6308 by 1-7s.

constellations.name: Caution: Standard Flask
constellations.description:
Increase the Level of Forbidden Creation - Isomer 75 / Type II by 3.
\nMaximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Chaotic Entropy
constellations.description: If Forbidden Creation - Isomer 75 / Type II triggers an Elemental Absorption, all party members gain a 20% Elemental DMG Bonus for the corresponding absorbed element during its duration.

name: Tartaglia
description: No. 11 of The Harbingers, also known as "Childe". His name is highly feared on the battlefield.

builds.name: Hydro DPS
builds.description: With the highest scaling Elemental Burst skill multiplier in the game, Tartaglia is an incredible Hydro damage dealer. Like Diluc, he becomes unstoppable with high constellations but does not need them to be extremely powerful.

showcase.description: This showcase features Zy0x with a massive crit of almost 400k damage. Zy0x is on a journey to reach over 100k damage on every single character and does it with ease on Tartaglia.

skills.name: Cutting Torrent
skills.description:
Normal Attack

Performs up to 6 consecutive shots with a bow.

Charged Attack

Perform a more precise Aimed Shot with increased DMG.
While aiming, the power of Hydro will accumulate on the arrowhead. An arrow fully charged with the torrent will deal Hydro DMG and apply Riptide status..

Riptide

Opponents affected by Riptide will suffer from AoE Hydro DMG effects when attacked by Tartaglia in various ways. DMG dealt in this way is considered Normal Attack DMG.

  • Riptide Flash: A fully-charged Aimed Shot that hits an opponent affected by Riptide deals consecutive bouts of AoE DMG. Can occur once every 0.7s.
  • Riptide Burst: Defeating an opponent affected by Riptide created a Hydro burst that inflicts the Riptide status on nearby opponents hit.

Plunging Attack

Fires off a shower of arrows in mid-air before falling and striking the ground, dealing AoE DMG upon impact. When Tartaglia is in Foul Legacy: Raging Tide's Melee Stance, he cannot perform a plunging attack.

skills.name: Foul Legacy: Raging Tide
skills.description:
Unleashes a set of weaponry made of pure water, dealing Hydro DMG to surrounding opponents and entering a Melee Stance.
In this Stance, Tartaglia's Normal and Charged Attacks change as follows:

Normal Attack

Performs up to 6 consecutive Hydro strikes.

Charged Attack

Consumes a certain amount of Stamina to unleash a cross slash, dealing Hydro DMG.

Riptide Slash

Hitting an opponent affected by Riptide with a melee attack unleashes a Riptide Slash that deals AoE Hydro DMG. DMG dealt in this way is considered Elemental Skill DMG, and can only occur once every 1.5s.

After 30s, or when the ability is unleashed again, this skill will end. Tartaglia will return to his Ranged Stance and this ability will enter CD. The longer Tartaglia stays in his Melee Stance, the longer the CD.
If the return to a ranged stance occurs automatically after 30s, the CD is even longer.

skills.name: Havor: Obliteration
skills.description:
Performs different attacks based on what stance Tartaglia is in when casting.

Ranged Stance: Flash of Havoc

Swiftly fires a Hydro-imbued magic arrow, dealing AoE Hydro DMG and applying the Riptide status.
Returns a portion of its Energy Cost after use.

Melee Stance: Light Obliteration

Performs a slash with a large AoE, dealing massive Hydro DMG to all surrounding opponents, which triggers Riptide Blast.

Riptide Blast

When the obliterating waters hit an opponent affected by Riptide, it clears their Riptide status and triggers a Hydro Explosion that deals AoE Hydro DMG.
DMG dealt in this way is considered Elemental Burst DMG.

passives.name: Never Ending
passives.description: Extends Riptide duration by 8s.

passives.name: Sword of Torrents
passives.description: When Tartaglia is in Foul Legacy: Raging Tide's Melee Stance, or if his Normal and Charged Attacks do CRIT DMG, they will apply the Riptide status effect on the hit enemy.

passives.name: Master of Weaponry
passives.description: Increases your own party member's Normal Attack Level by 1.

constellations.name: Foul Legacy: Tide Withholder
constellations.description: Decreases the CD of Foul Legacy: Raging Tide by 20%.

constellations.name: Foul Legacy: Understream
constellations.description: When opponents affected by Riptide are defeated, Tartaglia regenerates 4 Elemental Energy.

constellations.name: Abyssal Mayhem: Vortex of Turmoil
constellations.description:
Increases the Level of Foul Legacy: Raging Tide by 3.
\nMaximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Abyssal Mayhem: Hydrospout
constellations.description:
If Tartaglia is in Foul Legacy: Raging Tide's Melee Stance, triggers Riptide Slash against opponents on the field affected by Riptide every 4s, otherwise, triggers Riptide Flash.
\nRiptide Slashes and Riptide Flashes triggered by this Constellation effect are not subject to the time intervals that would typically apply to these two Riptide effects, nor do they have any effect on those time intervals.

constellations.name: Havoc: Formless Blade
constellations.description:
Increase the Level of Havoc: Obliteration by 3.
\nMaximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Havoc: Annihilation
constellations.description:
When Havoc: Obliteration is cast in Melee Stance, the CD of Foul Legacy: Raging Tide is reset.
\nThis effect will only take place once Tartaglia returns to his Ranged Stance.

name: Traveler (Anemo)
description: A traveler from another world who had their only kin taken away, forcing them to embark on a journey to find The Seven.

builds.name: Anemo Support
builds.description: This build empowers the Traveler's Anemo and Swirl damage, while simultaneously reducing enemies' Elemental RES for the rest of your party.

skills.name: Foreign Ironwind
skills.description:
Normal Attack

Performs up to 5 consecutive strikes.

Charged Attack

Consumes a certain amount of Stamina to unleash 2 rapid sword strikes.

Plunging Attack

Plunges from mid-air to strike the ground below, damaging enemies along the path and dealing AoE DMG upon impact.

skills.name: Palm Vortex
skills.description:
Grasping the wind's might, you form a vortex of vacuum in your palm, causing continuous Anemo DMG to enemies in front of you.
The vacuum vortex explodes when the skill duration ends, causing a greater amount of Anemo DMG over a larger area.

Hold

DMG and AoE will gradually increase

Elemental Absorption

If the vortex comes in contact with Hydro/Pyro/Cryo/Electro elements, it will deal additional elemental DMG of that type.
Elemental Absorption may only occur once per use.

skills.name: Gust Surge
skills.description:
Guiding the path of the wind currents, you summon a forward-moving tornado that pulls objects and opponents towards itself, dealing continuous Anemo DMG.

Elemental Absorption

If the tornado comes in contact with Hydro/Pyro/Cryo/Electro elements, it will deal additional elemental DMG of that type.
Elemental Absorption may only occur once per use.

passives.name: Slitting Wind
passives.description: The last hit of a Normal Attack combo unleashes a wind blade, dealing 60% of ATK as Anemo DMG to all opponents in its path.

passives.name: Second Wind
passives.description: Palm Vortex kills renegerate 2% HP for 5s. This effect can only occur once every 5s.

constellations.name: Raging Vortex
constellations.description: Palm Vortex pulls in enemies within a 5m radius.

constellations.name: Uprising Whirlwind
constellations.description: Increases Energy Recharge by 16%.

constellations.name: Sweeping Gust
constellations.description:
Increases the Level of Gust Surge by 3.
\nMaximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Cherishing Breezes
constellations.description: Reduces DMG taken while casting Palm Vortex by 10%.

constellations.name: Vortex Stellaris
constellations.description:
Increase the Level of Palm Vortex by 3.
\nMaximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Intertwined Winds
constellations.description:
Targets who take DMG from Gust Surge have their Anemo RES decreased by 20%.\n
\nIf an Elemental Absorption occurred, then their RES towards the corresponding Element is also decreased by 20%.

name: Traveler (Geo)
description: A traveler from another world who had their only kin taken away, forcing them to embark on a journey to find The Seven.

builds.name: Geo Support
builds.description: This build empowers the Traveler's Geo damage from his abilities. While Geo reactions are not great, his damage is good and the party-wide buff from his Constellation level 1 is also great.

skills.name: Foreign Rockblade
skills.description:
Normal Attack

Performs up to 5 consecutive strikes.

Charged Attack

Consumes a certain amount of Stamina to unleash 2 rapid sword strikes.

Plunging Attack

Plunges from mid-air to strike the ground below, damaging enemies along the path and dealing AoE DMG upon impact.

skills.name: Starfell Sword
skills.description:
You disgorge a meteorite from the depths of the earth, dealing AoE Geo DMG.
The meteorite is considered a Geo Construct, and can be climbed or used to block attacks.

Hold

The skill's positioning may be adjusted.

skills.name: Wake of Earth
skills.description:
Energizing the Geo elements deep underground, you set off expanding shockwaves.

Launches surrounding enemies back and deals AoE Geo DMG.

A stone wall is erected at the edges of the shockwave.

The stone wall is considered a Geo Construct, and may be used to block attacks.

passives.name: Shattered Darkrock
passives.description: Reduces Starfell Sword's CD by 2s.

passives.name: Frenzied Rockslide
passives.description: The final hit of a Normal Attack combo triggers a collapse, dealing 60% of ATK as AoE Geo DMG.

constellations.name: Invincible Stonewall
constellations.description: Allies within the radius of Wake of Earth have their CRIT Rate increased by 10% and have increased resistance against interruption.

constellations.name: Rockcore Meltdown
constellations.description: When the meteorite created by Starfell Sword is destroyed, it will also explode, dealing additional AoE Geo DMG equal to the amount of damage dealt by Starfell Sword.

constellations.name: Will of the Rock
constellations.description:
Increases the Level of Wake of Earth by 3.
\nMaximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Reaction Force
constellations.description:
The shockwave triggered by Wake of Earth regenerates 5 Energy for every enemy hit.\n

\nA maximum of 25 Energy can be recovered in this manner at any one time.

constellations.name: Meteorite Impact
constellations.description:
Increase the Level of Starfell Sword by 3.
\nMaximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Everlasting Boulder
constellations.description:
The barrier created by Wake of Earth lasts 5s longer.\n

\nThe meteorite created by Starfell Sword lasts 10s longer.

name: Venti
description: One of the many bards of Mondstadt, who freely wanders the city's streets and alleys.

builds.name: Anemo Support
builds.description: This build empowers Venti's energy recharge to minimize the downtime of his Elemental Burst skill. The Stringless is the preferred weapon.

builds.name: Aimed Shot
builds.description: The idea behind this build is to fire a powerful, fully charged Aimed Shot with Venti every 10 seconds, taking advantage of the extra 2 arrows from his first constellation, Splitting Gale.

skills.name: Divine Marksmanship
skills.description:
Normal Attack

Performs up to 6 consecutive shots with a bow.

Charged Attack

Perform a more precise Aimed Shot with increased DMG.
While aiming, favorable winds will accumulate on the arrowhead. A fully charged arrow will deal Anemo DMG.

Plunging Attack

Fires off a shower of arrows in mid-air before falling and striking the ground, dealing AoE DMG upon impact.

skills.name: Skyward Sonnet
skills.description:
O wind upon which all hymns and songs fly, bear these earth-walkers up into the sky!

Press

Summons a Wind Domain at the enemy's location, dealing AoE Anemo DMG and launching enemies into the air.

Hold

Summons an even larger Wind Domain with Venti as the epicenter, dealing AoE Anemo DMG and launching affected enemies into the air.
After unleashing the Hold version of this ability, Venti rides the wind into the air.

Enemies hit by Skyward Sonnet will fall to the ground slowly.

skills.name: Wind's Grand Ode
skills.description:
Fires off an arrow made of countless coalesced winds, creating a huge Stormeye that sucks in objects and enemies along its path, dealing continuous Anemo DMG.

Elemental Absorption

If the Stormeye comes into contact with Hydro/Pyro/Cryo/Electro elements, it will deal additional elemental DMG of that type.
Elemental Absorption may only occur once per use.

passives.name: Embrace of Winds
passives.description: Holding Skyward Sonnet creates an upcurrent that lasts for 20s.

passives.name: Stormeye
passives.description:
Regenerates 15 Energy for Venti after the effects of Wind's Grand Ode end.\n
\nIf an Elemental Absorption occurred, this also restores 15 Energy to all characters of that corresponding element.

passives.name: Windrider
passives.description: Decreases all party member's gliding Stamina Consumption by 20%.

constellations.name: Splitting Gale
constellations.description: Fires 2 additional arrows per Aimed Shot, each dealing 33% of the original arrow's DMG.

constellations.name: Breeze of Reminiscence
constellations.description:
Skyward Sonnet decreases enemy Anemo RES by 12% for 10s.\n
\nEnemies launched by Skyward Sonnet suffer an additional 12% Anemo RES and Physical RES decrease while airborne.

constellations.name: Ode to Thousand Winds
constellations.description:
Increases the Level of Wind's Grand Ode by 3.
\nMaximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Hurricane of Freedom
constellations.description: When Venti picks up an Elemental Orb or Particle, he receives a 25% Anemo DMG Bonus for 10s.

constellations.name: Concierto dal Cielo
constellations.description:
Increase the Level of Skyward Sonnet by 3.
\nMaximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Storm of Defiance
constellations.description:
Targets who take DMG from Wind's Grand Ode have their Anemo RES decreased by 20%.\n
\nIf an Elemental Absorption occurred, then their RES towards the corresponding Element is also decreased by 20%.

name: Xiangling
description: A renowned chef from Liyue. She's extremely passionate about cooking and excels at making her signature hot and spicy dishes.

builds.name: Pyro Support
builds.description: This build empowers Xiangling's Pyro DMG and uptime of her skills.

builds.name: Physical DPS
builds.description: This build is actually very similar to the support one, but it uses the Gladiator's Finale set to increase her Normal Attack damage significantly. Weapons also become a lot more important.

skills.name: Dough-Fu
skills.description:
Normal Attack

Performs up to 5 consecutive spear strikes.

Charged Attack

Consumes a certain amount of Stamina to lunge forward, dealing damage to enemies along the way.

Plunging Attack

Plunges from mid-air to strike the ground below, damaging enemies along the path and dealing AoE DMG upon impact.

skills.name: Guoba Attack
skills.description: Summons Guoba the Panda. Guoba continuously breathes fire, dealing AoE Pyro DMG.

skills.name: Pyronado
skills.description:
Displaying her mastery over both fire and polearms, Xiangling sends a Pyronado whirling around her.\n
\nThe Pyronado will move with your character for so long as the ability persists, dealing Pyro DMG to all enemies in its path.

passives.name: Crossfire
passives.description: Increases the flame range of Guoba by 20%.

passives.name: Beware, It's Super Hot!
passives.description: When Guoba Attack's effect ends, Guoba leaves a chili pepper on the spot where it disappeared. Picking up a chili pepper increases ATK by 10% for 10s.

passives.name: Chef de Cuisine
passives.description: When Xiangling cooks an ATK-boosting dish perfectly, she has a 12% chance to receive double the product.

constellations.name: Crispy Outside, Tender Inside
constellations.description: Enemies hit by Guoba's attacks have their Pyro RES reduced by 15% for 6s.

constellations.name: Oil Meets Fire
